item.title: comedy4cast se007: comedy4cast & friends LIVE from Dragon*Con 2011
item.dc:creator: comedy4cast - Comedy Podcast
item.description: For the third year in a row the Podcasting Track at Dragon*Con, Altanta's massive multi-media, pop culture convention, had a great lapse in judgement and allowed us to do a live show. This year Clinton was joined on stage by Chuck Tomasi and Kreg Stepp... Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
For the third year in a row the Podcasting Track at Dragon*Con, Altanta’s massive multi-media, pop culture convention, had a great lapse in judgement and allowed us to do a live show. This year Clinton was joined on stage by Chuck Tomasi and Kreg Stepppe, host of the Parsec-winning “Technorama,” Susie Murph from “How to Grow Your Geek,” and, for the first time on the live show, Bonnie! Here’s the audio. Enjoy. Recorded before a rather large, awesome live audience at Dragon*Con, September 4, 2011.

>> How to Grow Your Geek
>> Technorama
>> Dragon*Con
>> Become a fan on Facebook!
>> Follow us on Twitter
>> Help support comedy4cast and save money at the same time. VisitGoDaddy.com and use code “BLU7″ at checkout to save 10% on your order! Some restrictions apply. See site for details.
>> Our theme music generously provided by Brian McRae
